original_text: The donkey saw me and turned aside before me these three times. If she had not turned aside from me, surely just now I would have killed you and let her live.”
korean_text: 나귀가 나를 보고 이같이 세 번을 돌이켜 내 앞에서 피하였느니라 나귀가 만일 돌이켜 나를 피하지 아니하였더면 내가 벌써 너를 죽이고 나귀는 살렸으리라

sentences.original_text: and turned aside before me these three times.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 앞에서 세 번이나 비켜섰습니다

sentences.original_text: If she had not turned aside from me,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그것이 내 앞에서 비켜서지 않았더라면,

sentences.original_text: surely just now I would have killed you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 분명 지금쯤 너를 죽였을 것입니다
